Recommendations: curriculum should be revise and update to be participate in by the academic staff alumnus parent student and some stakeholder to make it relevance and responsive to the need of the time
a tracer study to assess the impact of the curricular program to the student and community as a whole may well ascertain the status of effectiveness and relevance of the program offer
syllabus should conform with the prescribed format reference must include recent research finding innovation along the field onlinewebsite and book of recent edition
subject offering be conveniently design to give allowance to major subject that require internshiponsite training seminar and thesis

since the program objective be gear towards global development through communication and arm with a strong workforce and a curriculum in consonance with cheds requirement it is highly recommend that the program be transfer to the college of development and communication
